name: Endless Ducker Game
description:
This is a very interesting PUZ game. The rules are very easy, but if you want high record, still need to use your head.

In the game, player need to eliminate color lump continually to get high record. The more color lump you eliminate, the higher record you will get.

But what need to pay attention is, every step you go always contain endless possibilities. Before you make any action, pls need to consider more.

Do you have a little heart? What are you waiting for? Just come on!
